title: NgRx Root State Management Options Schema

skipPackageJson.description: Do not add @ngrx/store as dependency to package.json (e.g., --skipPackageJson).

path.description: The path to create the state.

module.description: Allows specification of the declaring module.

maxAge.description: number (>1) | 0 - maximum allowed actions to be stored in the history tree. The oldest actions are removed once maxAge is reached. It's critical for performance. 0 is infinite. Default is 25 for performance reasons.
